traits.Poor Depth Perception: The cyclops has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away.

actions.Multiattack: The cyclops makes two greatclub attacks.
actions.Greatclub: Melee Weapon Attack: +9+1d6 + 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
actions.Rock: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9+1d6 + 6 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
